channel.title: How to peopl play my sever
channel.description: me and 3 friends wanna play my sever and how do they play it i have hamachi how do i do it if u help ill give u a lvl 106 rs acc whith a bgs

item.title: How to peopl play my sever
item.dc:creator: @itai itai
item.description:
@itai wrote:

OK change all server/source files to your ip, client.java, server.java (change it to your hamachi ip, it is up near the top where you turn hamachi on). You then if your using and ip change have them enter the hamachi ip and port (43594 is normal port), then they can connect if they are logged onto your hamachi network. If not then change egui.java in client to ur hamachi ip, client.java has some to change just find it and change it into hamachi ip. And server.java might have some to change and then give the client to them run ur source and they can get onâ€¦btw

SEARCH BUTTON!

Read full topic
